question: How many hours of daylight does Uppsala, Sweden receive during the summer solstice?
asked_question_translated: Quantas horas de luz do dia tem Uppsala, na Suécia, durante o solstício de verão?
answer: Durante o solstício de verão, Uppsala, na Suécia, tem aproximadamente 18 a 19 horas de luz do dia.
answer_translated_eng: During the summer solstice, Uppsala in Sweden has approximately 18 to 19 hours of daylight.
